name: Papi Commando in Ceplusplus Land *Sega Master System* Official Demo !!
name_original: Papi Commando in Ceplusplus Land *Sega Master System* Official Demo !!
description:
!! Papi Commando in Ceplusplus Land !!

* Sega Master System * Official Demo 

Don't wait to play it ! 

Play the 3 free Zone of Basic City in this free Plateformer Game's Demo !

Controls :

PAD : Move Papy ( You can use the DOWN direction to avoid ennemy or reach low passage. )

Button A : Jump.

Button B : Fire.

Button START : Pause Game / Life / Stuff Screen.

============================================

* Graphics : Vetea

* Music & Sound : Jon Something

* Code & Game Design : Calindro & ShiningBZH.

* Powered with Kidded by Calindro.

Complete version still WIP. Physical version coming Soon !

Stay tuned Fans ! ;-)

Studio Vetea.
